Terms of Use - Updated April, 2021.

Welcome to Preminder application which is developed by LEAP LLC, (“we” or “us“). It’s a free application.

When you (“you” or “user”) started using Preminder (“application” or “service“), you agreed with these Terms of Use (“terms”).

If you have questions, please contact us at info@preminder.me.

Using Preminder

Preminder does not provide any medical advice, diagnostic information or recommendations. You must consult with healthcare providers and make your medical decisions based on their advice.

If you use the application on from an Android device which you or someone else rooted or on or from an iOS device which you or someone else jailbroken, Preminder will not be responsible for the security of your data, including your personal information, and you shall bear all responsibility for any illegal access, loss data or can leave your smartphone vulnerable to attacks.

Registering an account

You can use Preminder without a user account (“account”). Without an account you can only use Preminder on one smartphone. If you lose this smartphone, you will not be able to restore your data.

To register an account, you must enter your email address and a password. You are responsible for keeping your password confidential.

Duration and termination

These agreements are signed for an indefinite period. You may terminate these agreements anytime.

Preminder may delete your account at any time and without prior notice if we believe you have breached these agreements.

Modification of these terms

We reserve the right to update or modify these agreements at any time. By continuing to use the service after any such changes, you agree to follow and be bound by these agreements as changed.

For these reasons, we encourage you to periodically review this Agreement.
